page.title: 06TRANSPORT IN GREENOCK
page.content: A low % of the people in this area are {car}owners. Most people uses {buses}, except in snowy or icy conditions in wintertime. On some wintry days no vehicles can get up or down the hills and people have to walk. The bus service is a very reliable one. There are three bus routes which terminate in our area. Some people think that there should be more bus shelters, but most of them are very pleased with the service. {Taxis} are very popular. They are favoured because they are quicker and they take their passengers directly where they are going. Although taxi fares are expensive, if four people share, this works out cheaper than the bus fares which they would pay.
